alert.note: Alert for Pribilof Islands (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued September 16 at 1:48PM AKDT until September 17 at 1:00AM AKDT by NWS Anchorage
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 AM AKDT SATURDAY... * WHAT...Southwest winds 50 to 65 mph with gusts between 80 and 90 mph expected. * WHERE...Pribilof Islands. * WHEN...Until 1 AM AKDT Saturday. * IMPACTS...High winds may move loose objects, damage property, and cause power outages. Travel will be difficult. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...A powerful storm is over the central Bering Sea and is tracking northeast towards St. Lawrence Island through Saturday morning. Winds will increase through the day today and reach peak intensity around 4pm. Winds will slowly decrease through the night. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... People should avoid being outside near structures or any material that may break or become dislodged due to wind stress. If possible, remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive.
